verses.verse: Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH1696> to<WH413> the children<WH1121> of thy people,<WH5971> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, When<WH3588> I bring<WH935> the sword<WH2719> upon<WH5921> a land,<WH776> if the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> take<WH3947> a<WH259> man<WH376> of their coasts,<WH4480> <WH7097> and set<WH5414> him for their watchman: <WH6822>
If when he seeth<WH7200> <WH853> the sword<WH2719> come<WH935> upon<WH5921> the land,<WH776> he blow<WH8628> the trumpet,<WH7782> and warn<WH2094> <WH853> the people;<WH5971>

Then whosoever heareth<WH8085> <WH8085> <WH853> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> and taketh not warning;<WH2094> <WH3808> if the sword<WH2719> come,<WH935> and take him away,<WH3947> his blood<WH1818> shall be<WH1961> upon his own head.<WH7218>

He heard<WH8085> <WH853> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> and took not warning;<WH2094> <WH3808> his blood<WH1818> shall be<WH1961> upon him. But he<WH1931> that taketh warning<WH2094> shall deliver<WH4422> his soul.<WH5315>

But if<WH3588> the watchman<WH6822> see<WH7200> <WH853> the sword<WH2719> come,<WH935> and blow<WH8628> not<WH3808> the trumpet,<WH7782> and the people<WH5971> be not<WH3808> warned;<WH2094> if the sword<WH2719> come,<WH935> and take<WH3947> any person<WH5315> from among<WH4480> them, he<WH1931> is taken away<WH3947> in his iniquity;<WH5771> but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1875> at the watchman's<WH6822> hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>

So thou,<WH859> O son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> I have set<WH5414> thee a watchman<WH6822> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> therefore thou shalt hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> at my mouth,<WH4480> <WH6310> and warn<WH2094> them from<WH4480> me.

When I say<WH559> unto the wicked,<WH7563> O wicked<WH7563> man, thou shalt surely die;<WH4191> <WH4191> if thou dost not<WH3808> speak<WH1696> to warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563> from his way,<WH4480> <WH1870> that<WH1931> wicked<WH7563> man shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity;<WH5771> but his blood<WH1818> will I require<WH1245> at thine hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>

Nevertheless, if<WH3588> thou<WH859> warn<WH2094> the wicked<WH7563> of his way<WH4480> <WH1870> to turn<WH7725> from<WH4480> it; if he do not<WH3808> turn<WH7725> from his way,<WH4480> <WH1870> he<WH1931> shall die<WH4191> in his iniquity;<WH5771> but thou<WH859> hast delivered<WH5337> thy soul.<WH5315>

Therefore, O thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH559> unto<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> Thus<WH3651> ye speak,<WH559> saying,<WH559> If<WH3588> our transgressions<WH6588> and our sins<WH2403> be upon<WH5921> us, and we<WH587> pine away<WH4743> in them, how<WH349> should we then live?<WH2421>

Say <WH559> unto<WH413> them, As I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> I have no pleasure<WH518> <WH2654> in the death<WH4194> of the wicked;<WH7563> but<WH3588> <WH518> that the wicked<WH7563> turn<WH7725> from his way<WH4480> <WH1870> and live:<WH2421> turn<WH7725> ye, turn<WH7725> ye from your evil<WH7451> ways;<WH4480> <WH1870> for why<WH4100> will ye die,<WH4191> O house<WH1004> of Israel?<WH3478>

Therefore, thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> say<WH559> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of thy people,<WH5971> The righteousness<WH6666> of the righteous<WH6662> shall not<WH3808> deliver<WH5337> him in the day<WH3117> of his transgression:<WH6588> as for the wickedness<WH7564> of the wicked,<WH7563> he shall not<WH3808> fall<WH3782> thereby in the day<WH3117> that he turneth<WH7725> from his wickedness;<WH4480> <WH7562> neither<WH3808> shall the righteous<WH6662> be able<WH3201> to live<WH2421> for his righteousness in the day<WH3117> that he sinneth.<WH2398>

When I shall say<WH559> to the righteous,<WH6662> that he shall surely live;<WH2421> <WH2421> if he<WH1931> trust<WH982> to<WH5921> his own righteousness,<WH6666> and commit<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> all<WH3605> his righteousnesses<WH6666> shall not<WH3808> be remembered;<WH2142> but for his iniquity<WH5766> that<WH834> he hath committed,<WH6213> he shall die<WH4191> for it.

Again, when I say<WH559> unto the wicked,<WH7563> Thou shalt surely die;<WH4191> <WH4191> if he turn<WH7725> from his sin,<WH4480> <WH2403> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right;<WH6666>

If the wicked<WH7563> restore<WH7725> the pledge,<WH2258> give again<WH7999> that he had robbed,<WH1500> walk<WH1980> in the statutes<WH2708> of life,<WH2416> without<WH1115> committing<WH6213> iniquity;<WH5766> he shall surely live,<WH2421> <WH2421> he shall not<WH3808> die.<WH4191>

None <WH3808> <WH3605> of his sins<WH2403> that<WH834> he hath committed<WH2398> shall be mentioned<WH2142> unto him: he hath done<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right;<WH6666> he shall surely live.<WH2421> <WH2421>
Yet the children<WH1121> of thy people<WH5971> say,<WH559> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal:<WH8505> <WH3808> but as for them,<WH1992> their way<WH1870> is not equal.<WH8505> <WH3808>
When the righteous<WH6662> turneth<WH7725> from his righteousness,<WH4480> <WH6666> and committeth<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> he shall even die<WH4191> thereby.
But if the wicked<WH7563> turn<WH7725> from his wickedness,<WH4480> <WH7564> and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right,<WH6666> he<WH1931> shall live<WH2421> thereby.<WH5921>
Yet ye say,<WH559> The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal.<WH8505> <WH3808> O ye house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> I will judge<WH8199> you every one<WH376> after his ways.<WH1870>

And it came to pass<WH1961> in the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> year<WH8141> of our captivity,<WH1546> in the tenth<WH6224> month, in the fifth<WH2568> day of the month,<WH2320> that one that had escaped<WH6412> out of Jerusalem<WH4480> <WH3389> came<WH935> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559> The city<WH5892> is smitten.<WH5221>

Now the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> upon<WH413> me in the evening,<WH6153> before<WH6440> he that was escaped<WH6412> came;<WH935> and had opened<WH6605> <WH853> my mouth,<WH6310> until<WH5704> he came<WH935> to<WH413> me in the morning;<WH1242> and my mouth<WH6310> was opened,<WH6605> and I was no more dumb.<WH481> <WH3808> <WH5750>
Then the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> they that inhabit<WH3427> those<WH428> wastes<WH2723> of<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478> speak,<WH559> saying,<WH559> Abraham<WH85> was<WH1961> one,<WH259> and he inherited<WH3423> <WH853> the land:<WH776> but we<WH587> are many;<WH7227> the land<WH776> is given<WH5414> us for inheritance.<WH4181>

Wherefore <WH3651> say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Ye eat<WH398> with<WH5921> the blood,<WH1818> and lift up<WH5375> your eyes<WH5869> toward<WH413> your idols,<WH1544> and shed<WH8210> blood:<WH1818> and shall ye possess<WH3423> the land?<WH776>

Ye stand<WH5975> upon<WH5921> your sword,<WH2719> ye work<WH6213> abomination,<WH8441> and ye defile<WH2930> every one<WH376> <WH853> his neighbor's<WH7453> wife:<WH802> and shall ye possess<WH3423> the land?<WH776>

Say <WH559> thou thus<WH3541> unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> As I<WH589> live,<WH2416> surely<WH518> <WH3808> they that<WH834> are in the wastes<WH2723> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> and him that<WH834> is in<WH5921> the open<WH6440> field<WH7704> will I give<WH5414> to the beasts<WH2416> to be devoured,<WH398> and they that<WH834> be in the forts<WH4679> and in the caves<WH4631> shall die<WH4191> of the pestilence.<WH1698>

For I will lay<WH5414> <WH853> the land<WH776> most desolate,<WH8077> <WH4923> and the pomp<WH1347> of her strength<WH5797> shall cease;<WH7673> and the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478> shall be desolate,<WH8074> that none<WH4480> <WH369> shall pass through.<WH5674>

Then shall they know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD,<WH3068> when I have laid<WH5414> <WH853> the land<WH776> most desolate<WH8077> <WH4923> because of<WH5921> all<WH3605> their abominations<WH8441> which<WH834> they have committed.<WH6213>

Also, thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> the children<WH1121> of thy people<WH5971> still are talking<WH1696> against thee by<WH681> the walls<WH7023> and in the doors<WH6607> of the houses,<WH1004> and speak<WH1696> one<WH2297> to<WH854> another,<WH259> every one<WH376> to<WH854> his brother,<WH251> saying,<WH559> Come,<WH935> I pray you,<WH4994> and hear<WH8085> what<WH4100> is the word<WH1697> that cometh forth<WH3318> from<WH4480> <WH854> the LORD.<WH3068>

And they come<WH935> unto<WH413> thee as the people<WH5971> cometh,<WH3996> and they sit<WH3427> before<WH6440> thee as my people,<WH5971> and they hear<WH8085> <WH853> thy words,<WH1697> but they will not<WH3808> do<WH6213> them: for<WH3588> with their mouth<WH6310> they<WH1992> show<WH6213> much love,<WH5690> but their heart<WH3820> goeth<WH1980> after<WH310> their covetousness.<WH1215>

And, lo,<WH2009> thou art unto them as a very lovely<WH5690> song<WH7892> of one that hath a pleasant<WH3303> voice,<WH6963> and can play well on an instrument:<WH5059> <WH3190> for they hear<WH8085> <WH853> thy words,<WH1697> but they do<WH6213> them not.<WH369>
And when this cometh to pass,<WH935> (lo,<WH2009> it will come,)<WH935> then shall they know<WH3045> that<WH3588> a prophet<WH5030> hath been<WH1961> among<WH8432> them.
